frontmatter.title: Changelogs
frontmatter.meta_title: BeoStore - Complete Mobile UI template for React Native
frontmatter.meta_description: BeoStore eases your journey and saves your time by introducing you how to build the app from scratch and supporting document visually. Simultaneously, BeoStore provides complete beautiful templates integrating diverse animations which you can directly and smoothly apply into React Native.

markdownRemark.html:
16 Nov version 2.4.2 

1. UPDATE - expo to latest version v31
2. FIXED - minior bug fix and performance improve

02 Dec version 2.4 

1. Add more cli version which can be run on Xcode and Android
2. The MapView on cli version will be remove for simply installing (for newbie)

08 Nov version 2.3 

1. Update Expo to latest version v.22
2. Update intro page
4. Replace Listview by Flat list for all page
5. Fixed prop-type issues on latest React Native release.
6. Update all library version and fixed the impact issues.
7. Refactor component code base for better re-use.

04 Oct version 2.2 

1. Update Expo to latest version v.21.0.1
2. Support IphoneX
3. Update latest dependencies libraries
4. Improve Flat list on category page and parallax effect.
5. Minor bug fix when libraries up-to-date cause the impact

1 Sep version 2.1 

1. Add more mapping page
2. Add more walkthrough page with awesome animation
3. Minor bug fix
4. Update Expo to latest version

version 2.0 

1. Add layout news: simple list view
2. Add layout news: one column list view
3. Add layout news: two column list view
4. Add layout news: card swipe view
5. Update React Native to latest 0.42 & dependencies library.
6. Add layout news: homepage
7. Fix some minor issues from Intro page.

version 1.0 

Release first version 1.0
